mapper.select: SELECT C.CHAL_ID , C.SUB_CLASS, C.FREQUENCY, C.MEMBER_ID, C.CHAL_NAME, C.START_DATE, C.END_DATE, (C.END_DATE - CURRENT_DATE+1) DDAY ,M.FILE_ROUTE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROOFS P WHERE CHAL_ID = C.CHAL_ID AND PROOF_WRITER = P.PARTICIPANT_ID AND INSTR( C.FREQUENCY, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN')) >0 AND P.WRITE_DATE = CURRENT_DATE) DAY ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHALLENGES C WHERE INSTR( C.FREQUENCY, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN')) >0 ) CHECKDATE FROM CHALLENGES C JOIN PARTICIPANTS P ON C.CHAL_ID = P.CHAL_ID JOIN MEDIA M ON C.CHAL_ID = M.GROUP_ID WHERE P.PARTICIPANT_ID = #{participantId} AND CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN C.START_DATE AND C.END_DATE AND M.SUB_GROUP = '썸네일'

SELECT C.CHAL_ID, C.SUB_CLASS, C.FREQUENCY, C.MEMBER_ID , C.CHAL_NAME, C.START_DATE, C.END_DATE ,P.PRIVATE_DONATE, Y.PAYMENT_ID, Y.PAYMENT_METHOD, ( C.START_DATE - CURRENT_DATE +1) dday, M.FILE_ROUTE FROM CHALLENGES C JOIN PARTICIPANTS P ON C.CHAL_ID = P.CHAL_ID JOIN PAYMENTS Y ON P.CHAL_ID = Y.GROUP_ID JOIN MEDIA M ON C.CHAL_ID = M.GROUP_ID WHERE P.PARTICIPANT_ID = #{participantId} AND C.START_DATE > CURRENT_DATE AND M.SUB_GROUP = '썸네일'

SELECT C.CHAL_ID, C.SUB_CLASS, C.FREQUENCY, C.MEMBER_ID , C.CHAL_NAME, C.START_DATE, C.END_DATE, P.RESULT, P.RESULT_POINT, C.RECEIPT, C.SHAREPOINT , M.FILE_ROUTE FROM CHALLENGES C JOIN PARTICIPANTS P ON C.CHAL_ID = P.CHAL_ID JOIN MEDIA M ON C.CHAL_ID = M.GROUP_ID WHERE P.PARTICIPANT_ID = #{participantId} AND CURRENT_DATE > C.END_DATE ORDER BY C.END_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT C.CHAL_ID, C.CLASSES, C.SUB_CLASS, C.CHAL_NAME, C.START_DATE, C.END_DATE, M.FILE_ROUTE, M.MEDIA_NAME,C.FREQUENCY FROM CHALLENGES C JOIN MEDIA M ON C.CHAL_ID = M.GROUP_ID WHERE M.SUB_GROUP = '썸네일' AND CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN C.START_DATE AND C.END_DATE ORDER BY CHAL_ID DESC
)A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{last} ) WHERE RN >= #{first}

SELECT CHAL_ID, CLASSES , SUB_CLASS , NGO_NAME , START_DATE , END_DATE , CONTENTS , FREQUENCY , PROOF_CONTENT , DONATION_FEE , MEMBER_ID , TEAM_FEE , CHAL_NAME , RECEIPT , USERCNT , TOTALDAYS(START_DATE, END_DATE, FREQUENCY) AS TOTAL , (CURRENT_DATE - START_DATE) as NOW_START , (CURRENT_DATE - END_DATE) as NOW_END , TOTALDAYS(CURRENT_DATE, END_DATE, FREQUENCY) AS DDAY FROM CHALLENGES WHERE CHAL_ID = #{chalId}

mapper.update: UPDATE CHALLENGES SET CLASSES = #{classes}, NGO_NAME = #{ngoName}, START_DATE = #{startDate}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, PROOF_CONTENT = #{proofContent} WHERE CHAL_ID=#{chalId}
mapper.select: SELECT C.CHAL_ID , C.CLASSES, C.SUB_CLASS, C.CHAL_NAME, C.START_DATE, C.END_DATE, C.DONATION_FEE, M.FILE_ROUTE, M.MEDIA_NAME, ROWNUM FROM CHALLENGES C JOIN MEDIA M ON C.CHAL_ID = M.GROUP_ID WHERE 3>=ROWNUM AND M.SUB_GROUP = '썸네일' ORDER BY C.DONATION_FEE DESC
SELECT * FROM MEDIA WHERE GROUP_ID = #{GROUPID} AND SUB_GROUP = '썸네일'
SELECT * FROM MEDIA WHERE GROUP_ID = #{GROUPID} AND SUB_GROUP = '인증예시'
SELECT * FROM MEDIA WHERE GROUP_ID = #{GROUPID} AND SUB_GROUP = '상세설명'

SELECT TOTALDAYS(START_DATE,END_DATE,FREQUENCY) TOTAL, CHAL_ID, CLASSES, SUB_CLASS, CHAL_NAME,NGO_NAME, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')||'~'||TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') TERM, MEMBER_ID, TEAM_FEE, DONATION_FEE, RECEIPT, SHAREPOINT FROM CHALLENGES WHERE CURRENT_DATE > END_DATE AND SUB_CLASS = #{subClass} ORDER BY END_DATE
SELECT COUNT(CHAL_ID) AS total FROM CHALLENGES
SELECT COUNT(CHAL_ID) AS total FROM CHALLENGES WHERE CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE
SELECT COUNT(CHAL_ID) AS total FROM CHALLENGES WHERE CURRENT_DATE > START_DATE
SELECT COUNT(CHAL_ID) AS total FROM CHALLENGES WHERE START_DATE > CURRENT_DATE

SELECT C.CHAL_ID , C.CLASSES, C.SUB_CLASS, C.CHAL_NAME, C.START_DATE, C.END_DATE, C.DONATION_FEE, M.FILE_ROUTE, M.MEDIA_NAME, CURRENT_DATE - C.START_DATE AS DDAY, ROWNUM FROM CHALLENGES C JOIN MEDIA M ON C.CHAL_ID = M.GROUP_ID WHERE 4>=ROWNUM AND SUB_GROUP = '썸네일' AND TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE) - C.START_DATE >=0 ORDER BY DDAY

SELECT P.CHAL_ID, COUNT(P.PARTICIPANT_ID) CNT, M.FILE_ROUTE, C.CHAL_ID , C.CHAL_NAME, C.FREQUENCY, C.SUB_CLASS, C.START_DATE, C.END_DATE, C.DONATION_FEE FROM PARTICIPANTS P JOIN CHALLENGES C ON P.CHAL_ID = C.CHAL_ID JOIN MEDIA M ON M.GROUP_ID = C.CHAL_ID GROUP BY P.CHAL_ID, M.FILE_ROUTE, C.CHAL_ID , C.CHAL_NAME, C.FREQUENCY, C.SUB_CLASS, C.START_DATE, C.END_DATE, C.DONATION_FEE ORDER BY CNT DESC
